# ThermoHydroMechanics; Small deformation, linear poroelastic. Thermal Strain is generated by the temperature increase. 1 element test compared with analytical solution
AddTest(
    NAME ThermoHydroMechanics_square1e0
    PATH ThermoHydroMechanics/analytical_verification
    EXECUTABLE ogs
    EXECUTABLE_ARGS square_1e0.prj
    WRAPPER time
    TESTER vtkdiff
    REQUIREMENTS NOT OGS_USE_MPI
    ABSTOL 1e-6
    DIFF_DATA
    square_1e2_pcs_0_ts_10_t_1000_ana.000000.vtu square_1e2_pcs_0_ts_10_t_1000.000000.vtu pressure_ana pressure
)

AddTest(
    NAME ThermoHydroMechanics_square1e0_num
    PATH ThermoHydroMechanics/numerical_verification
    EXECUTABLE ogs
    EXECUTABLE_ARGS square_1e0.prj
    WRAPPER time
    TESTER vtkdiff
    REQUIREMENTS NOT OGS_USE_MPI
    ABSTOL 1e-4
    DIFF_DATA
    square_1e0_OGS5.vtu square_1e2_pcs_0_ts_10_t_1000.000000.vtu PRESSURE1 pressure
    square_1e0_OGS5.vtu square_1e2_pcs_0_ts_10_t_1000.000000.vtu STRESS_XX sigma_xx
    square_1e0_OGS5.vtu square_1e2_pcs_0_ts_10_t_1000.000000.vtu DISPLACEMENT displacement
)
